name: JobTracker
description: An easy-to-use and stylish Job tracking application

scripts.rebuild-sqlite3: cd node_modules/sqlite3 amp;amp; npm run prepublish amp;amp; node-gyp configure --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/electron-v1.2-win32-x64 amp;amp; node-gyp rebuild --target=1.2.2 --arch=x64 --target_platform=win32 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/electron-v1.2-win32-x64

author: Vasilis Mourtzis
